text: "My Father's Eyes" is a 1998 song by Eric Clapton and is the leading single from his 13th studio album Pilgrim. It went to number 33 in the United Kingdom, number 72 in the Netherlands, number 12 in Iceland, number 41 in Scotland, number 2 in Canada and number 2 on the Billboard Adult Contemporary chart. It won a Grammy Award in 1999. ==Track listing== # "My Father's Eyes" # "Change the World" # "Theme from a Movie That Never Happened" (Orchestral) # "Inside of Me" ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Eric Clapton songs
title: My Father's Eyes (song)
